guide.introduction:
How to Repair DS Lite (NDSL) Bottom LCD Screen

This is a step-by-step guide to removing the damaged bottom LCD Screen of your Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) and replacing it with a new one.

I would really like to say that this not an easy repair, so you might not want to do it all yourself because you might mess things up. So you can get it repaired at Nintendo Repair Shop.

Find cheap original Nintendo DS Lite replacement LCD Screens at the Nintendo Repair Shop Inc., along with any other Nintendo DS Lite repair parts you may need.

You will also need the Nintendo DS Lite Triwing Screwdriver for this repair.

Stay tuned for more NDSL repair tutorials, for any comments or any questions at NDS Lite bottom LCD Repair. Thanks for watching.
